topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5411098563687234b55a0000#post_5411098563687234b55a0000
I like some dubs. I think the NGE dub is better, especially grant as Asuka since she sounds more strident and haughty as well as having broken German whereas her Japanese VA is too formal.

Also the Shinji guy can crack his voice so yea.


School rumble and Gurren lagann dubs are good as well. And FMA.

"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541109ed6368722e48dc0000#post_541109ed6368722e48dc0000
It's the trope maker, But it does have a lot of elements that people attribute to evangelion.

Like Kouji Not being an ace off the bat. (He actually destroyed most of the city when he first piloted mazinger)

. . . You know; I'm going to be completely honest here; honestly my dream job would be a porn star. Eventually the industry is going to stabilize, but right now it's kind of rocky.

topics.body:
"@Whatevs":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54110a486368725f19bf0100#post_54110a486368725f19bf0100
That's the thing, or at least that's what I've always thought: as long as the translation is accurate, nothing gets cut out, and the voice actors do their jobs, the language should not matter. But still, we have people pissing and moaning about how "it's not in Japanese, therefore it shit."

topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/541109f4636872739f410000#post_541109f4636872739f410000

I saw it when I was 15. Yeah, I thought the same because of how dumb I was.

Like "This show gets me" and all that stuff.

What I'm saying is that while it can be jarring seeing the hate to some stuff, it boils down to personal preference, but at the same time, there are valid reasons to dislike something.

"@QuasarNova":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54110aeb63687239382d0100#post_54110aeb63687239382d0100
Of course there are always valid reasons. The problem is is that not everyone is willing to give them. They think something is bad, that its badness is self evident to everyone, and can't possibly fathom why someone would think differently.

topics.body:
Basically, Evangelion deconstructed anime character archetypes and otaku stuff rather than mecha.

A lot of the mecha elements in getter robo were ripped from Mazinger and the Getter robo saga. (And Ultraman, But that's not really mecha)
